name: Pass the Pigs
description:
A Big Pig Adventure! Visit pig-tastic landmarks and silly landings around the globe on your quest to Pass the Pigs before you Pig Out and lose all your points.

  • Rack up 100 points by Pig Rolling using the stylus.
  • Increase your chances of throwing a Snouter or Trotter by upgrading your pig with an Iron Snout or a Pig In Boots.
  • Earn fame and fortune in the World Tour mode as your travel around the world.
